description: Overall health of all Spinnaker services

panels.content:
# Spinnaker main monitoring dashboard

Select desired service at the top dropdown. 

If one chart is in alert, try changing the service selection dropdown until you see which service is misbehaving.

alert.message: Some service is taking a long time to respond (increased controller latency).
alert.name: Service controller latency

alert.message: Some service is receiving slow responses from downstream (increased outgoing requests latency).
alert.name: Outgoing service requests latency

alert.message: Some service is returning 5xx error responses.
alert.name: 5xx errors sent

panels.description: Ideal value: Chart empty at all times.
panels.title: <- $service 5xx errors returned by controller / method

panels.description: Ideal value: Chart empty at all times.
panels.title: $service 5xx errors received by requestHost <-

alert.message: Some service has resilience4j circuitbreaker being executed.
alert.name: Resilience4j circuitbreaker

panels.description:
Ideal value: Chart empty at all times.
A "success" fallback means that the original request failed and a fallback behavior was executed. A "failed" fallback means that both, original and fallback behaviors failed. A "circuitOpen" means sustained failures causing fallbacks.
panels.title: $service Hystrix fallbacks

alert.message: Some service stopped reporting JVM metrics.
alert.name: JVM memory usage

panels.description: Ideal value: below half the total memory available to pod.
panels.title: $service JVM memory usage by instance

alert.message: Clouddriver caching is taking a long time.
alert.name: Clouddriver caching agents time

alert.message: High error responses querying AWS infrastructure in clouddriver.
alert.name: Clouddriver AWS failed requests

panels.title: $service AWS failed requests by error / requestType

title: Spinnaker - main - 2.20+
